 Beneath The Massacre is a Technical Death Metal Band band hailing 
 from Montreal, Canada, formed by Christopher Bradley (Guitar),    
 Dennis Bradley (Bass), Elliot DesgagnÃƒÂ©s (Vocals) and Justin       
 Rousselle (Drums).                                                
                                                                   
 Their first EP, Evidence of Inequity, was released in 2005, under 
 Galy Records. In early 2006, the band signed with Prosthetic      
 Records and in 2007, they released their first full-length album, 
 Mechanics of Dysfunction, through the label.
